text:

trans:
1. Ticket box of Domestic departure terminal, Noi Bai Airport
Soc Son District
Telephone number: +844.35844494 * Fax number: +844.37282808
Business hours: 04:00 - 21:00 (GMT+7) Everyday
2. Ticket Office [redacted_address]
Telephone number: +8424.7108.8268 * Fax number: +8424.7108.8268
3. Ticket office [redacted_address]
Business hours:
07:30 - 20:00(GMT+7) From Monday to Saturday 07:30 - 18:00 (GMT+7) Sunday & holidays (not applied for ticket offices located at the airport)
Q [redacted_address]
1. Ticket office, Departing terminal, Lien Khuong airport Business hours:  09:00 - 12:30 (GMT+7) Everyday
2. Ticket office [redacted_address]
Tel: +8463.3822895
